subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, Pat Noonan of the New England Revolution entered a first-round playoff game against Chicago at the start of the second half, less than three weeks after the operation to repair a sports hernia.
snippet: On Saturday, Pat Noonan of the New England Revolution entered a first-round playoff game against Chicago at the start of the second half, less than three weeks after the operation to repair a sports hernia.
